ValidationRule.description: Prospectors and Pre Sales are not allowed to edit Demo fields when a RT Sales/Agency Acquisition opp has a hunting stage RO-1180
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( NOT($Permission.Edit_Demo_Hunter_and_Demo_date), NOT( $Permission.MVP_Opp_Creation ), OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Sales", RecordType.DeveloperName = "Agency_Acquisition"), $Profile.Name = "Large Prospector",
OR( TEXT(StageName) = "Demo Held", TEXT(StageName) = "Pilot Definition", TEXT(StageName) = "Offer", TEXT(StageName) = "Contract received", TEXT(StageName) = "Closed Won", TEXT(StageName) = "Closed Lost"),
OR( ISCHANGED(Hunter__c), ISCHANGED(Demo_Date__c))
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot edit the fields "Demo Hunter" or "Demo Date" in this stage.
